dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Though I may forgive them in Father's stead... he will not find the same clemency within him for my absolution.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: La Manchaland opens soon. How... many of the Family will visit me today, I wonder. How many times will I be forced to tell them 'It's going to be okay' today, I wonder.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
There once was a time when I believed in the greatness of hemobars.
Every gnashing of my teeth against this brick reminds me of the foolishness behind that faith.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
Did you ever get a good look at the hands of the Brothers who visit me? Their hands, their fingernails are all torn and pulled from digging through the dirt...
But I only have one thing to tell them. That they have to just live on, no matter what. That we have to endure this hardship.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Our only sustenance is blood given to us by humans. Ah, how sweet it is.
Yet the happiness of the Family remains buried forever in these grounds...

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Here's something I learned while giving consultations to humans in my attraction.
My Family has but one desperate, endlessly repeating question—a wish, even—how can we withstand this thirst? But human concerns are so... varied.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: This too, must be endured... This is a discipline for myself. The retribution Father would have given me... had he not left on his adventure.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
I know. Any attempts to try to suppress this thirst, to forget it for even a second... it's all pointless. I've tried them all myself.
But... what else can I do but feed them these... stock phrases? If you know anything else I can tell them, please... I...! I want to know, too.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I want... blood... no. Don't even think about it. Ah... where is Father now, I wonder? Did he find the helm, the Relic?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Did you think about blood today? I did. What about yesterday? Yeah, what about yesterday? Did you also think about blood? Of course I did. Then how about tomorrow? Will you think about blood tomorrow? Are you sure? No, we shouldn't. But can we not think about blood? We're Bloodfiends.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Though this shame may be masked... the thirst underneath its surface won't leave me alone.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: If that is your wish.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let reason be with me today.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Can you come back later for the consultation? I'm a bit... occupied at the moment.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Are you a sinner as well?

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: This too shall be forgiven...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Pain... must be endured...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: ... so rest now, forevermore.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Hnh. Finally... freed from... the hunger...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I'm always here... for you. If something ails you... again, feel free to pay a visit any time.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I just... need some time. I can't think about anything other than... blood...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: This is just... a fleeting thirst. I shouldn't let this victory high compel me into quenching it. Of course not.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Blood... there is... so much blood... overflowing... Give it to me! A sip— no, even a droplet of blood! Even if Father will never forgive me for it... I need this!!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg:
Not only did I defy my Father... I sought blood...
This failure is the humiliation I deserve.
